channel.title: Polishing My Shoes
channel.description: I am giving a talk tonight. As usual, I'm busy avoiding preparing for it. It is a rare day now-a-days that I put on a shirt and smart trousers but as I'm meeting folks I've never met before in a...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Mariano Szklanny+00:00
item.description:
Nice post! It remainds me of my grandparents... :)
thanks for this!
item.dc:creator: Mariano Szklanny

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: A really nice post. It's interesting how things have changed so much. My grandfather just couldn't fathom it, but it always made him smile..
item.dc:creator: Ben

item.title: Comment by kook+00:00
item.description: ur grandfather is quite possibly gay, so you have two things in common.
item.dc:creator: kook

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description:
My Grandfather has been dead for over 30 years, but he's probably still better looking than you.
Anyway, thanks for the schoolyard feedback.
item.dc:creator: Martin
